Research

During my undergraduate studies, I had opportunities to experience RF system design.
During my masters, I studied time-frequency analysis focusing on Wigner-Ville Distribution.
Currently, I am working as an analog circuit designer to fulfill my military service.


RF System Design



Time-Frequency Analysis

Traditional frequency analysis has its background in Fourier Transform, which provides information only on frequency components.
WVD (Wigner-Ville Distribution) provides joint information on time and frequency.
With appropriate kernel design, WVD provides far more information than Fourier Transform, without significant loss of information.

Analog Circuit Design

I designed analog blocks including crystal oscillator, charge pump, LDO, and PLL.

32kHz Crystal oscillator, LF6S
Charge Pump, LF6S

LDO, SMIC40LL
PLL, SMIC40LL
